## Dev dependencies
```js
--dev eslint-config-airbnb eslint-config-prettier eslint-plugin-import eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y eslint-plugin-prettier eslint-plugin-react eslint-plugin-react-hooks
```

## Dependencies
```js
styled-icons styled-components redux-saga redux-devtools-extension redux react-redux react-router-dom prop-types numeral moment lodash jest babel-jest babel-eslint axios
```

## Scripts
```json
    "lint": "./node_modules/react-scripts/node_modules/.bin/eslint src",
    "lint:fix": "./node_modules/react-scripts/node_modules/.bin/eslint src --fix"
```
